Class Obstacle<THitBoxType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.muss_and_toeberg.snake_that.game_objects.obstacles.Obstacle<THitBoxType>
  • Type Parameters:
    THitBoxType - specifies the type of HitBox (if Rectangle or Circle)
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExplodingBarrel, Portal

extends java.lang.Object
    Parent-Class for the different obstacles
